name: 馬尚智
objective: 授課內容涵蓋適用於通道解碼之數學工具、各種通道解碼系統相關架構及其工作原理。主要目標為讓學生瞭解通道解碼之基本原理、分析方法以及系統架構。
schedule:
I. Linear block codes (1st wk ~ 5th wk)
1.　　Maximum likelihood decoding
2.　　Standard array
3.　　Syndrome decoding
4.　　Hamming codes
5.　　Reed-Muller codes

II. Cyclic codes (6th wk ~ 11th wk)
1.　　Introduction to algebra
2.　　Encoding
3.　　Error-trapping decoding
4.　　BCH codes
5.　　Reed-Solomon codes

III. Convolutional codes (12th wk ~ 15th wk)
1.　　Structural properties
2.　　Distance properties
3.　　The Viterbi algorithm
4.　　Turbo codes

IV. Coded modulation (16th wk ~ 18th wk)
1.　　Set partitioning
2.　　Block coded modulation
3.　　Multistage decoding
4.　　Trellis coded modulaion
scorePolicy:
隨堂考試 50%
期末報告 50%
materials: Error Control Coding, 2nd edition, Shu Lin and Daniel J. Costello, Jr.  歐亞書局
